Posts.Content: An alcohol free liquid concentrate in vegetarian capsules. Discovered in Europe, goat's rue is one of the most potent herbs known to increase breast milk and also helps stimulate the development of mammary tissue. This formula helps adoptive mothers to successfully breastfeed, as well as women with Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS), women who have had breast surgery and is also helpful for women who did not increase in breast size during pregnancy. This product does not contain any milk, dairy, egg, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, or gluten.
Posts.Title: Goat's Rue
